ModMetaData.name: A Business of Ferrets
ModMetaData.author: Ekksu / Xen / Cucumpear / Thirite / Whizzard / Lindseyrie / Walking Problem
ModMetaData.description: Some ferret love for Aavak. Thank you for being awesome. This includes only the frerrets form Animal Collab Project plus a built in patch for A Dog Said. Do not use this mod if you already have Animal Collab installed.
